project.description:
This will start the Fitnesse server as a *NIX Daemon.

In addition, it will delete and recreate the symbolic link to the external, separately version controlled, wiki root document.
You can check that it is running with :
ps aux | grep fitnesse | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}'

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FITNESSE_WIKI_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the Git managed directory hierarchy we'll use for testing.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo Disable background job termination pwd cp ../BuildFitnesse/dist/fitnesse.jar .
BUILD_ID=allow_to_run_as_daemon
( java -jar fitnesse.jar -p 8088 ) &
rm -f index.html* wget -q http://localhost:8088 cat index.html
